resources.string:
1. There are 20 tiles. Hidden below these tiles are 10 random images each repeated twice.
 2. The user can touch on any two tiles. Touching on a tile will show the image.
 3. If the two tiles have matching images, they disappear. The user gets a point.
 4. If the two tiles do NOT have matching images, they flip over to being tiles again.
 5. A game can be resumed if the user come back from other screens.
